item.description:
We haven't done this before but let's give it a shot! A Potluck and Game Night.

We can have several groups playing different games around the apartment while trying different foods. This will be low key and of course delightful. Bring a game or two (I just heard about this game called Qwerkle), food or drink to share, and of course yourself!

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: A Potluck & Game Night
